definition: role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

sentences.english: Turret and the main building is the city's only high-level structure of wood construction.
sentences.chinese: 主楼与角楼是城内唯一的高层木结构建筑。

sentences.english: I told him what the turret was and what it was built for.
sentences.chinese: 我告诉彼得什么是角楼，它是用来做什么的。

sentences.english: The ancient simple pile-dwellings of Miao lie on the green slopes.
sentences.chinese: 古朴的吊角楼斜倚在绿色的山坡上。

sentences.english: And he shall set engines of war and battering rams against thy walls, and shall destroy thy towers with his arms.
sentences.chinese: 支起破城机撞击你的城墙，用铁器击毁你的角楼。

sentences.english: Walls of a turret on each side are symmetrical.
sentences.chinese: 城墙两侧各有一角楼互为对称。

sentences.english: And between the going up of the corner unto the sheep gate repaired the goldsmiths and the merchants.
sentences.chinese: 银匠与商人在城的角楼，和羊门中间修造。

sentences.english: Our house has this turret you can’t get into from inside.
sentences.chinese: 我们这座房子有个角楼，从房子里面进不去。

sentences.english: The ancient Diaojiao Lou is reclining on green slopes.
sentences.chinese: 古朴的吊角楼斜倚在绿色的山坡上。

definition: enceinte of a city gate/barbican entrance to a city
bell tower/campanile/clock tower/Bell Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
Zhonglou district of Changzhou city 常州市[Chang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
a drum tower/Drum Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
